ceterms:description: The Certified Nurse Aide (CNA) Course at USF Crown Point will prepare you to begin your career as a health care professional. In just eight weeks, you’ll complete the classroom and clinical hours necessary to be eligible for certification by the Indiana State Department of Health. That means you’ll soon be able to begin caring for patients under the supervision of a registered nurse or licensed practical nurse
ceterms:name: Course Fee (CNA Crown Point)
